programmes.show_description: A complete rundown of the 30 biggest selling singles in the UK for 1998, including the first chart-topper from Steps!
There's nothing quite like a cheesy good party... Unless its a 90s cheesy party that is!! These are the greatest party anthems from the 90s. Fact!
Mark Goodier with the decades's top 20 best selling albums - featuring 2 songs from each. Including iconic releases such as Urban Hymns, Jagged Little Pill, Stars & Abba Gold!
Girl Power! Boyband pin-ups, Britpop & High School Heroes! We're spending a whole week with the Smash Hits & Guilty Pleasures of the 1990s!
60 minutes of acts that had a single smash hit number 1, then never darkened the top 20 ever again! From Maria McKee in 1990 to Baz Luhrmann at the end of the decade.
From Elton & Aqua to Celine & Cher - these all sold over a million in the 90s! But only one sold over 2 million - can you guess?
The standout chart music that defined the decade - from Britpop, Boybands & R&B to the birth of electronic dance beats!
Can you believe that 1997 delivered so many huge movie hits? Top songs from Trainspotting, Men In Black, Spice World, Evita & more!
Kick back and relax with some mellow moments. Chilled to perfection.
Simon Bates hosts the ultimate countdown of 90s power ballads. Yes - 100 songs with big vocals, big guitars & massive breakdowns in a 10 hour marathon! Expect Mariah & Bon Jovi.
Kick back and relax with some mellow moments. Chilled to perfection.
Girl Power! Boyband pin-ups, Britpop & High School Heroes! We're spending a whole week with the Smash Hits & Guilty Pleasures of the 1990s!
The One & Only year - bookended by The KLF, and featuring Cher, The Prodigy, Simply Red & Vic Reeves! Jenny Powell takes a Joyride through the pages of yet another NOW Yearbook.
Girl Power! Boyband pin-ups, Britpop & High School Heroes! We're spending a whole week with the Smash Hits & Guilty Pleasures of the 1990s!
Amazingly some of your favourite 90s hits weren't originals - they were sung years earlier by someone else! Surprises galore from Take That, Vic Reeves, Steps, Pet Shop Boys & more
The decade where we did the Bartman, took a Trip to Trumpton & had Sex on the Beach! The 90s were full of nonsense & Pat Sharp was the silliest of them all!
Girl Power! Boyband pin-ups, Britpop & High School Heroes! We're spending a whole week with the Smash Hits & Guilty Pleasures of the 1990s!
From Britney to Madonna and Robbie to Elton, these are the 50 biggest videos from the artists that ruled the 1990s. Every video a full on smash hit!
Girl Power! Boyband pin-ups, Britpop & High School Heroes! We're spending a whole week with the Smash Hits & Guilty Pleasures of the 1990s!
From Beats International in 1990 to the Wamdue Project in 1999 - Kiss FM legend Bam Bam presents 65 big party number 1s of the 1990s! Back to back & in order.
Girl Power! Boyband pin-ups, Britpop & High School Heroes! We're spending a whole week with the Smash Hits & Guilty Pleasures of the 1990s!
Before Facebook, Twitter and Instagram were a thing, the school disco was the only social hangout that mattered! Let's party like it's the 90s just one more time.
